step_feedback.feedback: While you attempted to stretch your arm overhead, the wrist and elbow movements show inconsistencies. Try to keep your arm straighter and maintain a consistent hand position throughout the exercise.
The palm opening and closing needs more focus.  Ensure your palm is fully open and your fist is fully closed for each repetition.  Visualize the fluid moving with each pump.
The wide palm opening and closed fist are not consistent.  Focus on the full range of motion for each repetition.
Inconsistent fist clenching and hand opening.  Concentrate on coordinating your breathing with the hand movements; inhale while making a fist, exhale while opening your hand.

exercise_summary: You attempted the overhead pumping exercise, but consistency in arm position and hand movements needs improvement.  Focus on fully opening your palm and making a tight fist, coordinating with your breath. Remember to visualize the fluid moving with each pump.
